Summary: bright white odd shaped light heading straight upwards towards outer space
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my front porch smoking a cigarette and I just happened to look up and I saw a bright white light headed directly upwards. It was going slow, as a matter of fact I couldnt see it moving it seemed to move while I was not looking. I watched for about five minutes as the light moved even more and I thought it could just be a star but it was too bright and visibility was not good and I had to look really hard to see any stars. This was shaped like a five point "stick" star and was irregularly bright. I came inside to get my camera and when I went back outside to take a picture, I aimed my camera and I could see the craft through my screen but when I actually took the picture I couldnt see the light anywhere. I changed my settings on my camera and took pictures with every kind of flash so that it wasnt "poor flash" and I managed to get a picture with a view of the light but it was much smaller than what it should have been.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in St Albans
There were no other sightings in St Albans on or around October 3rd 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
